issue.title: [CF 1283] Add a way to track the style of icons
issue.body:
As usual - I might just be missing this, but if not-

Currently the icons all have a bezel and round corners. It would be cool to be able to switch the theme of icons, either by profile or by group, the same way we can switch the style of bars (I tried using the bar style but it didn't affect icon styles in any way I could perceive).


> Posted by CurseForge user ariehg | Imported from CurseForge issue #1283 | Raw
